publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1830 Karen Whitefield: The Achievement of Airdrie Academy Pupils and Staff—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils and staff of Airdrie Academy on the excellent voluntary work that they carried out during their recent trip to Peru, where pupils helped to refurbish a local school through extensive redecoration, replacing windows and digging an irrigation trench to pipe in water, and congratulates the local community who helped to raise funds for the project.
S2M-1830 The Achievement of Airdrie Academy Pupils and Staff (lodged on 5 October 2004) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-1830 Karen Whitefield: The Achievement of Airdrie Academy Pupils and Staff—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils and staff of Airdrie Academy on the excellent voluntary work that they carried out during their recent trip to Peru, where pupils helped to refurbish a local school through extensive redecoration, replacing windows and digging an irrigation trench to pipe in water, and congratulates the local community who helped to raise funds for the project. Supported by: Donald Gorrie
S2M-1830 The Achievement of Airdrie Academy Pupils and Staff (lodged on 5 October 2004) Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*
S2M-1830 The Achievement of Airdrie Academy Pupils and Staff (lodged on 5 October 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1830 The Achievement of Airdrie Academy Pupils and Staff (lodged on 5 October 2004) Rosie Kane*
S2M-1830 The Achievement of Airdrie Academy Pupils and Staff (lodged on 5 October 2004) John Swinburne*
